parameters.name: MateTypeFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined in swMateType_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: AlignFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined in swMateAlign_e

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the component, false otherwise

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance value to use with distance or limit mates

parameters.name: DistanceAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum distance value (see Remarks )

parameters.name: DistanceAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum distance value (see Remarks )

parameters.name: GearRatioNumerator
parameters.description: Gear ratio numerator value for gear mates

parameters.name: GearRatioDenominator
parameters.description: Gear ratio denominator value for gear mates

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle value to use with angle mates

parameters.name: AngleAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum angle value

parameters.name: AngleAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum angle value

parameters.name: ForPositioningOnly
parameters.description: True to only position the components according to the mating relationship and not return a mate, false to return a mate

parameters.name: LockRotation
parameters.description: True to lock component rotation, false to not

parameters.name: ErrorStatus
parameters.description: Success or error as defined by swAddMateError_e

title: IAssemblyDoc.AddMate4
signature:
Mate2 AddMate4( 
   System.Int32
MateTypeFromEnum
,
   System.Int32
AlignFromEnum
,
   System.Boolean
Flip
,
   System.Double
Distance
,
   System.Double
DistanceAbsUpperLimit
,
   System.Double
DistanceAbsLowerLimit
,
   System.Double
GearRatioNumerator
,
   System.Double
GearRatioDenominator
,
   System.Double
Angle
,
   System.Double
AngleAbsUpperLimit
,
   System.Double
AngleAbsLowerLimit
,
   System.Boolean
ForPositioningOnly
,
   System.Boolean
LockRotation

ErrorStatus

parameters.name: MateTypeFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined in swMateType_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: AlignFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined in swMateAlign_e

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the component, false otherwise

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance value to use with distance or limit mates

parameters.name: DistanceAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum distance value (see Remarks )

parameters.name: DistanceAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum distance value (see Remarks )

parameters.name: GearRatioNumerator
parameters.description: Gear ratio numerator value for gear mates

parameters.name: GearRatioDenominator
parameters.description: Gear ratio denominator value for gear mates

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle value to use with angle mates

parameters.name: AngleAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum angle value

parameters.name: AngleAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum angle value

parameters.name: ForPositioningOnly
parameters.description: True to only position the components according to the mating relationship and not return a mate, false to return a mate

parameters.name: LockRotation
parameters.description: True to lock component rotation, false to not

parameters.name: ErrorStatus
parameters.description: Success or error as defined by swAddMateError_e

remarks:
The difference between this method and the now obsolete IAssemblyDoc::AddMate3 is that this method's LockRotation parameter provides the option to lock the rotation of components in the mate.
To specify a distance mate without limits, set the DistanceAbsUpperLimit and DistanceAbsLowerLimit parameters equal to the Distance parameter.
If MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateDISTANCE or swMateType_e.swMateANGLE, and the mate is applied to the closest position that meets the mate condition specified by Distance or Angle, then setting Flip to true moves the assembly to the other possible mate position.
To add a mate:
Call
IModelDoc2::ClearSelection2
before selecting entities to mate.
Call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
to select each entity to mate.
If MateTypeFromEnum is...
Use selection mark...
swMateType_e.swMateCAMFOLLOWER
8
swMateType_e.swMateWIDTH
16
Other swMateType_e option
1
Call this method.
Call IModelDoc2::ClearSelection2 after the mate is created.
If nothing is preselected, then ErrorStatus is swAddMateError_IncorrectSelections, and nothing is returned.
